original_text: So the time will soon come when I will punish Babylon's idols. The whole country will become ashamed. Its people will die and their dead bodies will lie everywhere. So the time will soon come when I will punish Babylon's idols. The whole country will become ashamed. Its people will die and their dead bodies will lie everywhere. So the time will soon come when I will punish Babylon's idols. The whole country will become ashamed. Its people will die and their dead bodies will lie everywhere. So the time will soon come when I will punish Babylon's idols.
korean_text: 그러므로 보라 날이 이르리니 내가 바벨론의 우상들을 벌할 것이라 그 온 땅이 치욕을 당하겠고 그 죽임 당할 자가 모두 그 가운데에 엎드러질 것이며

sentences.original_text: So the time will soon come
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 때가 곧 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: when I will punish Babylon's idols
The whole country will become ashamed
Its people will die
and their dead bodies will lie everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 시체는 도처에 널려 있을 것이다
